footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the sacred origins of Ayahuasca and how it can help you heal.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced spiritual guides who will accompany you on your journey.
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your journey.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start your healing path.
registerSuccessDescription: A verification email has been sent. Please check your inbox.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral brew from the Amazon, made from the combination of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the Chacruna leaves (Psychotria viridis). For centuries, indigenous communities have used it in ceremonies to connect with the spiritual world, find guidance, and heal deep emotional and physical ailments.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The brew induces a modified state of consciousness, allowing for profound introspection and the release of emotional blockages. It is a journey into the subconscious, guided by the spirit of the plant, which reveals hidden patterns, heals past traumas, and offers clarity about one's life purpose. The experience is both challenging and deeply revealing.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant, a wise teacher that guides each person in a unique and personalized way. It does not offer easy answers but provides the tools to find them within oneself. Its purpose is to teach, purify, and show the path to a fuller and more authentic life.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find answers to deep questions, discover their life purpose, and achieve a state of mental peace.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It helps release repressed traumas and emotions, promoting deep emotional and, in some cases, physical healing.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: The experience fosters a profound sense of unity with nature, the universe, and all beings.
groupCeremonyDescription: Participating in a group creates a field of collective energy that enhances the experience. Shared vulnerability and trust in a sacred space amplify the healing and allow for mutual learning.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and focused process, we offer private ceremonies. This allows for personalized work tailored to the specific needs and intentions of the participant.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the loving and experienced team that will accompany you on your healing journey.
guide_desc_wilson_alfaro: Spiritual guide with a deep connection to Amazonian traditions. Trained in the Peruvian Amazon, Wilson Alfaro brings an ancestral understanding of Ayahuasca and its healing power. His experience facilitates a safe and trustworthy space for personal exploration.
guide_desc_jacob: Spiritual master trained in the Peruvian Amazon, where he learned the sacred use of ancestral medicine directly from healers. With a serene and profound presence, he guides ceremonies at Casa Trinitos (Guanacaste), where he accompanies transformation processes.
guide_desc_harley: Specialist in medical care and first aid, with experience in guided meditations and therapeutic massages. Her calm and professional presence ensures a safe environment throughout the ceremony, providing confidence and support to both the team and the participants.
guide_desc_johanna: Guardian of the medicine trained in the Peruvian Amazon. Providing ceremonies in Colombia and Costa Rica, her presence brings security, support, and balance between the physical and spiritual, upholding the ceremonial space with firmness, care, and a deep connection to female healing.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming events and relive the magic of our past ceremonies.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no ceremonies scheduled at this time. Please check back soon.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to the ceremony details here.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. Are you sure?
ceremonyMovedToPast: It will now appear in past events.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
authRequiredDescription: You must be logged in to view the reservation details for this ceremony.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
preparationCtaDescription: Everything you need to know to prepare for your ceremony and make the most of your experience.
preparationGuideSubtitle: Follow these steps to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for the ceremony.
preparationProcessDescription: We guide you from the beginning to ensure you arrive prepared.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space guided by experts to ensure your safety.
experienceProcessDescription: A journey of introspection, healing, and deep connection.
integrationProcessDescription: We provide support to help you integrate the teachings into your daily life.
dietSubtitle: For at least 3 days before the ceremony, we recommend a clean diet to purify your body.
allowedFoodsList:
Fresh fruits and vegetables
Whole grains (rice, quinoa, oats)
Legumes (lentils, chickpeas)
Nuts and seeds
Herbal teas and plenty of water
prohibitedFoodsList:
Red meat and pork
Fried and processed foods
Dairy and aged cheeses
Refined sugar and sweets
Caffeine and alcohol
mentalPrepSubtitle: A calm and open mind is key to a profound experience.
meditationDescription: Practice meditation to calm your mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you wish to heal or understand. What questions do you bring to the medicine?
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes. It's a great tool for clarification.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring up deep emotions. Come with an open heart, ready to receive, release, and forgive. Trust the process and the wisdom of the plant. We will be there to support you at all times.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
comfortItemsList:
Comfortable, layered clothing (white or light colors)
A blanket and a pillow or mat
A bottle of water
A notebook and pen for journaling
essentialsList:
Personal hygiene items
Any personal medication (notify the guide)
An open and receptive attitude
An object of personal power (optional)
mustBeLoggedInToView: You must be logged in to view the preparation guide.
questionnaireSubtitle: Your safety is our priority. Please answer honestly.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions? (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, epilepsy)
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication, especially antidepressants or mood stabilizers?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list all medications and their dosages.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of mental health conditions? (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: I want to heal..., I want to understand..., I am looking for clarity on...
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with ayahuasca or other psychoactive substances?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: Please briefly describe your previous experiences.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
preparationCompleteDescription: You have finished all the steps of your preparation guide. You are now ready to embark on this transformative journey. We look forward to seeing you at the ceremony!
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: Here are the answers you submitted.
noAnswersSubmitted: You have not submitted your answers yet.
whatToBringSubtitle: We recommend bringing the following to ensure a comfortable and safe experience.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Here you can review all the information in your preparation guide at any time.
